name: AxelQuest
description:
Welcome!

We are two (noob) indie-game developers and we need your help to test our first demo game.

Join Axel Quest, a fluffy fat cat adventure! Help Axel to come back home to his family! Survive in a dangerous Mayan world and find the crystals for Blox the demon possessed box.  He will carry you home but be prepared, in order to get crystals you will face enemies and ancient lethal traps!

Discover the mayan jungle with this demo and give us your opinion as we develop our game.

We have a lot in store for Axel Quest and we can't wait to show you! 

Stay tuned for further updates!

If you enjoyed the demo please don't forget to give us your feedback through the following google forms, it's really important for us to know your thoughts!

  • General feedback at: https://forms.gle/LzsZy1453CxjaHhQ9
  • for suggestions or bugs at:  https://forms.gle/G8WxMM9ERasV46LTA
Thank you!
